com.esri.mo2.map.img
Interface ImageLayerSource

All Superinterfaces:
LayerSource
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseImageLayerSource
Deprecated. - the interface has been deprecated, see Content API.

public interface ImageLayerSource
extends LayerSource

ImageLayerSource is a kind of LayerSource that provides imagery from ArcIMS ImageServer.

Method Summary

Method Detail

getImageURL

public URL getImageURL(Tile tile)
                throws IOException
Deprecated. 
obtain the URL that is required to load the proposed map Image within the given Tile. In all currently supported cases, the ImageLayerSource normally contacts the remote ImageServer and requests that the map Image be created. It is possible that the remote Image Server may change the characteristics of the Image to be loaded, in which case the ImageLayerSource must change the Image to be loaded within the Tile. This method should block until the map has been created and its Image URL is available.

Parameters:
tile - the Tile containing the proposed Image
Returns:
the image URL
Throws:
IOException - for any problem that may occur obtaining the image url

reconstructLayer

public void reconstructLayer(SubLayerSnapshot snapshot)
Deprecated. 
for convenience, you can reconstruct the subLayers of an ImageServerLayer using the given SubLayerSnapshot. This might be necessary for ImageLayerSources that can change the subLayers at any time, perhaps because of some scale dependency-relatonship. The ImageServerLayer associated with the SubLayerSnapshot will be modified.

Parameters:
snapshot - the SubLayerSnapshot
